# Agent Compose Kit

> YAML-driven agent system builder for Google ADK (library-only)

Agent Compose Kit turns YAML into ADK agent systems — services, tools, agents,
registries, and a graph builder — all programmatic, built on google-adk and
relying on google-adk-extras for durable backends.


## Overview

- [Overview](https://deadmeme5441.github.io/agent-compose-kit/index.md): What this package is and when to use it

## Installation

- [Installation](https://deadmeme5441.github.io/agent-compose-kit/install/index.md): Install with uv/pip and optional extras

## Configuration & Services

- [Configuration](https://deadmeme5441.github.io/agent-compose-kit/config/index.md): Configuration schema and env interpolation
- [Services](https://deadmeme5441.github.io/agent-compose-kit/services/index.md): Session/Artifact/Memory backends and URIs

## Tools & Agents

- [Tools](https://deadmeme5441.github.io/agent-compose-kit/tools/index.md): Function/MCP/OpenAPI tools and usage
- [Agents](https://deadmeme5441.github.io/agent-compose-kit/agents/index.md): Models, sub-agents, workflows, A2A (agent cards)

## Registries

- [Registries](https://deadmeme5441.github.io/agent-compose-kit/registries/index.md): Tool/MCP/OpenAPI/Agent registries and groups

## Graph & Public API

- [Graph](https://deadmeme5441.github.io/agent-compose-kit/graph/index.md): Build a system graph (nodes/edges)
- [Public API](https://deadmeme5441.github.io/agent-compose-kit/public_api/index.md): SystemManager/SessionManager/run_text

## Examples & FAQ

- [Examples](https://deadmeme5441.github.io/agent-compose-kit/examples/index.md): End-to-end examples
- [FAQ](https://deadmeme5441.github.io/agent-compose-kit/faq/index.md): Common questions
